name: LUP (itch) (epiblitikos)
description:
LUP is a text-based game about you and a wolf and how you interact. It is also a game about surviving the harsh cold tundra, about finding food and shelter to make it to the next day.

This prototype was made in a week from Jan 13 to Jan 19 using Twine. Part of the reason I made it was to learn about Twine, and the other main part was to take a stab at writing a story that made the player feel like their choices mattered, even if the scope of their effect was relatively small or short-reaching.
